description.narrative: When considering the above situation, and despite the existence of some research studies regarding the city, it seems urgent to carry out a comprehensive assessment to be entitled “The State of Addis Ababa Report: the City We Want in 2025”, analysing in a thorough and cross-cutting manner the current situation, with a focus on socio-economic aspects, and providing key recommendations to both local and federal government authorities on how to improve the situation within a time horizon of ten (10) years.

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

title.narrative: Appropriate mechanisms, currently not existing, are established to fosterensure the implementation and ensure monitoring of the Report’s recommendations.

description.narrative: Appropriate mechanisms, currently not existing, are established to fosterensure the implementation and ensure monitoring of the Report’s recommendations.

title.narrative: Production of the State of Addis Ababa Report including a thorough diagnostic and , policy directions and recommendations for decision-makers.Local and federal government authorities provided with clear policy directions and strategic recommendations on how to improve structural interventions in Addis Ababa city in the future.

baseline.value: No State of the City Report available for Addis Ababa providing such policy directions and strategic recommendations

target.value: State of Addis Ababa Report prepared and validated

title.narrative: Local and federal government authorities are better informed as they are provided with clear policy directions and strategic recommendations on how to improve structural interventions in Addis Ababa city in the future

title.narrative: Design of the an implementation strategy for the Report’s recommendations, indicating who will do what and when as well as the respective monitoring procedures.Appropriate mechanisms established to ensure the implementation and monitoring of the Report’s recommendations.

baseline.value: No institutional nor operational mechanisms yet in place to improve the implementation of urban development interventions in Addis Ababa Indicator of achievement

target.value: Proper mechanisms for implementing the Report’s recommendations are in place
